statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_medical_records WHERE test_type = 'Blood Test' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, dob, test_type, test_result FROM patient_medical_records WHERE gender = 'Male' LIMIT 3;
SELECT patient_name, gender, test_result FROM patient_medical_records WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY test_date;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE test_result_id IS NOT NULL AND test_result_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob FROM patient_medical_records WHERE test_result_id = 1;
SELECT test_type, test_date, test_result FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patient_medical_records WHERE test_type LIKE '%Blood%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob, test_result FROM patient_medical_records WHERE test_result_id > 5 ORDER BY dob ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_medical_records WHERE gender='M';
SELECT test_id, test_date, test_result FROM genetic_test_results ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, blood_type FROM patient_medical_records WHERE blood_type='AB+';
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, blood_type FROM patient_medical_records WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, blood_type FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, gender, test_result FROM patient_medical_records JOIN genetic_test_results ON patient_medical_records.patient_id = genetic_test_results.patient_id WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT patient_name, gender, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%M %e, %Y') AS formatted_birth_date FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_name LIKE '%J%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, gender, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT test_id, test_type, result FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM precision_medicine_research ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY dob DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN genetic_tests ON patients.patient_id=genetic_tests.patient_id WHERE patients.gender='Female' AND genetic_tests.test_type='Genetic Sequencing' LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE ethnicity='Caucasian' AND diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT research_id, researcher_name, research_topic, start_date FROM precision_medicine_research WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM patients JOIN genetic_tests ON patients.patient_id=genetic_tests.patient_id JOIN precision_medicine_research ON patients.patient_id=precision_medicine_research.research_id WHERE patients.ethnicity IS NULL OR precision_medicine_research.research_topic IS NULL LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, test_result FROM Patients JOIN GeneticTests ON Patients.patient_id = GeneticTests.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, GeneticTests.test_result FROM Patients JOIN GeneticTests ON Patients.patient_id = GeneticTests.patient_id;
SELECT MedicalRecords.diagnosis, ResearchData.research_description FROM MedicalRecords JOIN ResearchData ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = ResearchData.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_id, MedicalRecords.date_of_visit, GeneticTests.test_date, ResearchData.research_topic FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id LEFT JOIN GeneticTests ON Patients.patient_id = GeneticTests.patient_id LEFT JOIN ResearchData ON Patients.patient_id = ResearchData.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords JOIN Patients ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.id WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors JOIN Clinics ON Doctors.doctor_id = Clinics.clinic_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, GeneticTests.test_result FROM Patients JOIN GeneticTests ON Patients.id = GeneticTests.patient_id;
SELECT clinic_name, location FROM Clinics WHERE clinic_id = 1;
SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Doctors JOIN MedicalRecords ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id ORDER BY MedicalRecords.record_date ASC;
